FtpIt is a privately-held professional hosting company founded in Ohio, USA. We are a leading provider of un-managed VPS hosting. We provide hosting solutions and technology to successful individuals, entrepreneurs and small to medium-sized business around the globe. We have been business for more than one and half years.

We are kicking in with our expansion offers.

All SSD servers run on pure SSD disks with RAID10 and the latest Intel Xeon E3 CPUs, backed up by an LSI RAID card! KVM plans are backed by E5 CPU, with at least 128 GB of RAM, SSDs for caching, along with a premium network.
 
Plans will be instantly activated upon payment receipt. IPv6 is not available at this time.
Payments for FtpIt are now accepted via PayPal, Credit and Debit cards and Bitcoins(via BitPay).

We don't allow the following on our servers, anyone found using them will be terminated instantly:

Resource Hogs including, but not limited to Minecraft

Anything related to Digital Currencies mining

Exit TOR node/Torrents

Mass mail/SPAM

Anything illegal in the USA

Legal adult content is allowed

For more information, visit our site: http://www.ftpit.com .

Thanks for your time!
